name: The Original Black Coffee
description: Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans steeped in hot water, served warm.

name: The Latte
description: The latte is comprised of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a touch of foam.

name: The Cortado
description: Like yin and yang, a cortado is the perfect balance of espresso and warm steamed milk. The milk is used to cut back on the espresso's acidity.

name: The Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top.

name: The Americano
description: With a similar flavor to black coffee, the americano consists of an espresso shot diluted in hot water.

name: The Espresso
description: To make espresso, water is forced through finely ground coffee beans at very high pressure. An espresso shot can be served solo or used as the foundation of most coffee drinks, like lattes and macchiatos.

name: The Macchiato
description: The macchiato is another espresso-based drink that has a small amount of foam on top. It's the happy medium between a cappuccino and a doppio. This coffee drink features a shot of espresso topped with a layer of frothy foam.

name: The Mocha
description: For all you chocolate lovers out there, you'll fall in love with a mocha. The mocha is a chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.

name: The Flat White
description: This Aussie-born drink is basically a cappuccino without the foam or chocolate sprinkle. It's an espresso drink with steamed milk.

name: The Café au Lait
description: Café au lait is perfect for the coffee minimalist who wants a bit more flavor. Just add a splash of warm milk to your coffee and you're all set!
